summary: BETA Simple mod that makes the augmented perks for Destruction more powerful.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod will make the augmented perks for Destruction more powerful.
While playing on any difficulty other than \"novice\" I felt extremely ineffective as a mage, at first I made this mod for myself, but figured there would be no harm in sharing it with others who want a simple fix to feeling under-powered like me.

COMPATABILITY
This mod does not work well with any other Mod that touches on the Augmented-frost/fire/lightning perks for Destruction!
author: Luxinsanity
